title: Fascinating Facts About Your Body

metadata.description: In this WebMD slideshow, you’ll learn the good, the bad, and the ugly about your body -- including some fascinating facts you’ll wish you never knew.

Fascinating Facts About Your Body
Medically Reviewed by Jabeen Begum, MD on March 07, 2024
1/11
Tongue Lashing

Few muscles are as hard-working as the tongue. By day, it twists to form the sounds you speak and pushes around the food you eat. While you sleep, your tongue moves saliva down your throat.
